formatted_address: 10 Bayfront Ave, B2-41 The Shoppes at Marina Bay Sands, Singapore 018972
name: TUMI Marina Bay Sands

reviews.text: We had amazing customer service at the TUMI Store Marina Bay!  When we picked up our TUMI Alpha duffle bag from the airline upon arrival in Singapore, a wheel was missing. This bag is 10 years old and has been utilized on many adventures. Because it is an older bag, it only had two wheels to begin with, unlike today‚Äôs bags that utilize four wheels. The thought of dragging this large bag for the next three weeks through Singapore and Thailand was disheartening. The staff at TUMI store went the extra mile and repaired the bag in three business days, at what we thought was a very reasonable cost. They kept us fully informed of the progress during the process. We owe them a huge ‚ÄúThank you‚Äù for taking such good care of us, especially Helen.

Top notch and professional service by all the staff members at the boutique. Was served by Sue who gave very good suggestions and tips on which luggage worked best. Very happy with our purchase. Have also been here previously for repair work, which was  well handled as well, fuss-free! Highly recommended üëçüèº

Truly excellent service! Top quality products with a service to match. Always keen to help. In particular you should seek out Adan as he's never let me down and always goes the extra mile. But I can also say the rest of the team have always impressed too. Thanks team, please keep it up!
Sue at the Tumi store in Singapore was amazing! She was friendly, helpful, and really knew her stuff. She made shopping easy and enjoyable. Highly recommend asking for her!
The team at MBS Tumi, especially Sue & Michael, were fabulous! They managed to help me get the item I wanted, after searching high and low. Kudos to the team & would definitely be back again!

vicinity: 10 Bayfront Avenue, B2-41 The Shoppes at Marina Bay Sands
